title: APA-Total JV makes oil discovery off Suriname coast - Reuters
content:
June 21 (Reuters) - APA Corp (APA.O) said on Tuesday its joint venture with France's TotalEnergies SE (TTEF.PA) has made an oil discovery at an exploration well off the coast of Suriname.

description: Most stock markets in the Gulf ended higher on Tuesday, tracking oil prices and global shares as China eased some quarantine requirements for international arrivals which raised hopes for stronger growth and a revival in demand for commodities.
title: Most Gulf bourses gain, tracking oil, global shares - Reuters

description: OPEC's oil revenue surged in 2021 as prices and demand recovered from the worst of the COVID pandemic, while the number of its members' active rigs posted a modest rebound and new completed wells declined, data from the group showed.
title: OPEC boosts oil income in 2021, well completions drop - Reuters.com

description: Oil prices fell on Wednesday after rising in the previous three sessions but losses were limited on the view that global supply tightness will continue as there is limited room for major producers such as Saudi Arabia to boost production.
title: Oil prices take breather after three-day rally - Reuters.com

description: Asian shares wobbled while commodity prices fell on Thursday as mounting worries about the risks of a global recession amid aggressive rate hikes by the Federal Reserve kept broad investor sentiment fragile.
title: Asia shares struggle, oil falls as recession fears linger - Reuters
